movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.plot: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.
movies.quote: Mama always said life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.

movies.title: Howl's Moving Castle
movies.plot: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 14 wins & 17 nominations.

movies.title: Inception
movies.plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
movies.quote: You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

movies.title: Inside Out
movies.plot: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
movies.quote: Do you ever look at someone and wonder what's going on inside their head?

movies.title: Joker
movies.plot: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.
movies.quote: I used to think that my life was a tragedy, but now I realize, it's a comedy.

movies.title: Memento
movies.plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 50 wins & 56 nominations.
movies.quote: I have to believe in a world outside my own mind. I have to believe that my actions still have meaning, even if I can't remember them. I have to believe that when my eyes are closed, the world's still there.

movies.title: My Neighbor Totoro
movies.plot: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.
movies.quote: Trees and people used to be good friends.

movies.title: Pan's Labyrinth
movies.plot: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.
movies.quote: But when he looked into her eyes, he saw no fear. He saw only acceptance.

movies.title: Princess Mononoke
movies.plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.
movies.quote: Life is suffering. It is hard. The world is cursed. But still, you find reasons to keep living.

movies.title: Singin' in the Rain
movies.plot: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 6 nominations.
